Author: nglbutterflies
Text: I know exactly what you mean. I've been here before and it's so frustrating! Good thing is, the extreme hunger doesn't last forever.   This was happening to me especially at the beginning of my recovery. I confided in a few medical professionals around me and they told me that it's my body's way of healing itself, of getting the nutrients I was deficient in, even if I already had more than enough calories for the day. That was very hard for me to hear, but in hindsight I think they were probably right.   I'd highly recommend checking out this video:  [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XsUXEk2lVnw](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XsUXEk2lVnw)
